summary: This Mod makes the Draugr Scarier Than the original, more zombie like. Textures are 4096x4096.
descriptionHtml:
Hey Guys, this is the first time i post a mod here.

This Mod Makes The Draugr Look Like Burnt Corpses, More Scarier than the original. 
Textures Have Ultra-High Resolution (4096 x 4096)
Replaces Male and Female Draugr Body and Armor.

Install:
Put the Textures Folder Inside the Data Folder on you Skyrim Game Folder.

Uninstall:
Delete \"Draugr\" folder in Data/Textures/Actors

FUTURE UPDATES:
More Variants for it. Different Skins Like:
The Epic Zombie with some wounds (like the one from oblivion, I loved that one)
The Dead Warrior with some cuts and scars
Teeh ultimate gore one (ROFL!)
and i think i will do too just a plain Hd Reskin for the draugr.
oh. and Zombie sounds i will add too.
when the CK is out i will make them Stand-alones. 
you guys are free to give me some ideas, i love retexturing.

Enjoy and Don\'t forget To Endorse if you like this mod.

Credits:
Grohiik/David Aron
author: Grohiik
